script.message: Hi!
Let's query for neurons in the ellipsoid body!
Now let's add neurons in the optic glomeruli.
Now let's undo what we just did.
Now let's add neurons from the PB.
Done!
It is all yours now! Try it yourself!

undo_1.description: Go back to a previous step (UNDO).

script.message: Hi!
Let's query for neurons from the entire caudoventrolateral protocerebrum!
Now let's only keep known fruitless neurons and remove the rest.
Done!
It is all yours now! Try it yourself!

keep_1.description: Filter neurons in the current workspace based on a specific query.

script.message: Hi!

script.message: Let's move the cursor over the neurons to highlight them!

highlight_1.description: Remove neurons from the current workspace based on a specific query.

script.message: Hi!
Let's first bring up neurons in the Ellipsoid Body!

script.query: Show Neurons in the Ellipsoid Body

script.message: Let's move the cursor over a neuron, and click on it!
The information of the selected neuron has been loaded from the FlyCircuit Database!
Try it yourself!

select_1.description: Click on a neuron to show its information from FlyCircuit Database.

script.message: Hi!
Let's first bring up gabaergic neurons in the Ellipsoid Body!
Let's move the cursor over some neurons, and use 'double click' to pin them!
The pinned neurons always remain highlighted.
Let's remove all unpinned neurons.
Now we only have pinned neurons in the scene.
Want to unpin a neuron? Use 'Double click' on a pinned neuron to unpin it.
Try it yourself!

pin_1.description: Pin a neuron via 'Double Click' to make it stick in the scene.

script.message: Done!
It is all yours now! Try it yourself!

local_1.description: Show local neurons in the right antennal lobe, and add interneurons in the left antennal lobe.

script.message: Hi!
Let's query for serotonergic neurons in the Ellipsoid Body!
Let's bring in glutamatergic neurons in the Ellipsoid Body!
Let's add cholinergic neurons in the Ellipsoid Body!
Let's also have dopaminergic neurons in the Ellipsoid Body!
Finally, let's add gabaergic neurons in the Ellipsoid Body!
Done!
It is all yours now! Try it yourself!

neurotransmitter_1.description: Show serotonegic neurons in the Ellipsoid Body, and sequentially add glutamatergic, cholinergic, dopaminergic and gabaergic neurons.

script.message: Hi!
It is known that Lobula Plate Tangential Cells are an essential component of optomotor responses.
Let's try and find some  LPTCs from the FlyCircuit data:

script.query: show neurons connecting the left lop to the left cvlp

script.message: Now let's add neurons from the other side of the brain.

script.query: add neurons connecting the right lop to the right cvlp

script.message: Now let's select from the workspace some tangential cells and pin them.
Let's remove the unpinned neurons.
And unpin all the pinned neurons.
Now let's hide the neurons one by one
Let's bring back one of the neurons!
Done!
Try exploring detailed information from the Info Panel!

lptc.description: Query for Lobula Plate Tangential Cells.
